The Elephant and 
 the Frogs 
 
 Mozambican folktale 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 A long time ago, the 
 
 king of the bush was 
 
 Mr. Lion. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He sent his animals to stop 
 
 the noise coming 
 
 from a smal lake in the 
 
 bush. But they did not 
 
 suced! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 An elephant voluntered to 
 
 stop it. 
 
 The elephant was sent out 
 
 as a guard. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 At midnight the noise 
 
 began and the elephant 
 
 started kiling the frogs. He 
 
 did the same thing the next 
 
 day. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 After a couple of weks, 
 
 King Lion was hapy 
 
 because the elephant had 
 
 stoped the noise. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But about a month 
 
 later, they saw a lot of 
 
 insects on their farm. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 King Lion asked the 
 
 elephant to cal the 
 
 frogs to come and eat the 
 
 insects. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The elephant was very 
 
 nervous because he had 
 
 kiled al of them. He said: 
 
 Sory, sory, I k- k- k- kiled 
 
 them! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then King Lion said: 
 
 Elephant, I asked you 
 
 to stop the noise, not 
 
 to kil the frogs. And the 
 
 elephant was put in 
 
 prison for many years! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And the king told al the 
 
 animals to always do 
 
 exactly what he said.
